testCases.name: Prioritize Install Attributed Source - Navigation
testCases.description: 2 Source, 1 Trigger. Trigger should match with install-attributed source.

testCases.name: Ignore Install Attributed Source - Navigation
testCases.description: 2 Source, 1 Trigger. Trigger should match with high priority source and ignore install-attributed source due to install-cooldown expiry.

testCases.name: Prioritize Install Attributed Source - Event
testCases.description: 2 Source, 1 Trigger. Trigger should match with install-attributed source.

testCases.name: Ignore Install Attributed Source - Event
testCases.description: 2 Source, 1 Trigger. Trigger should match with high priority source and ignore install-attributed source due to install-cooldown expiry.

testCases.name: Should truncate trigger data - Event
testCases.description: 1 Source, 1 Trigger. They should match and event report's trigger data should be truncated.

testCases.name: Should truncate trigger data - Navigation
testCases.description: 1 Source, 1 Trigger. They should match and event report's trigger data should be truncated.

testCases.name: Respect Report Count limit
testCases.description: 1 source, 2 triggers. New trigger shouldn't be attributed as it is same priority.

testCases.name: Replace low priority report - event
testCases.description: 1 source, 2 triggers. New trigger should be attributed as it is higher priority.

testCases.name: Replace low priority report - navigation
testCases.description: 1 source, 4 triggers with increasing priority. The lowest priority report should be replaced by the 4th trigger report.

testCases.name: Replace the most recent low priority report with the higher priority
testCases.description: 1 source, 4 triggers. First 3 triggers with same priority and 4th trigger higher priority. The most recent report should be replaced by the higher priority trigger.

testCases.name: Should matches but no report generated - AttributionMode = Never
testCases.description: 2 sources, 1 trigger. Ignore 1st source, match with 2nd source but it has attribution mode = Never. Hence, no reports generated

testCases.name: Should matches but no report generated - AttributionMode = Falsely
testCases.description: 2 sources, 1 trigger. Ignore 1st source, match with 2nd source but it has attribution mode = Falsely. Hence, no report generation

testCases.name: Trigger event level filter - no filters in triggers - picks first event trigger.
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger with 2 event triggers. Neither top level filters nor event level filters in triggers. Picks first event trigger to generate event report

testCases.name: Trigger top level filter doesn't match with source filter - no report generated
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger. Ignore trigger, hence no event report generated

testCases.name: Trigger event level filter - event report generated for first MATCHING event trigger
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger - 2 event triggers. Ignore first event trigger due to filter mismatch, hence generate event report with second event trigger

testCases.name: Trigger event level filter - 2 filters matching in event triggers - picks first event trigger.
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger with 2 event triggers. Filters of both event triggers match with source. Picks first event trigger to generate event report

testCases.name: Trigger event level filter - matches event trigger with overridden source type match
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger - 3 event triggers. Ignore first event trigger due to source type field mismatch, 2nd event trigger matches hence picked and report generated

testCases.name: Trigger event level not filters - event report generated for first non-matching event trigger
testCases.description: 1 source, 1 trigger - 3 event triggers. Ignore 1st event trigger due to filter mismatch, ignore 2nd for not_filters match, picks 3rd where not_filters mismatch hence generate event report with 3rd event trigger
